mods.identifier: Memphis - Nurses and nursing - Visiting nurse association
mods.abstract: "Mrs. Susie Malone of the Visiting Nurse Association of Memphis demonstrates the type of service provided by her agency for patients convalescing at home. The child is Helen Cross, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Remus Cross of 248 East Exchange. Visiting nurses dress wounds, give hypodermics and baths, teach young mothers about infant care, help chart nutritious meals and provide professional nursing service."

relatedItem.abstract: A collection of all things Memphis... a little bit of this, a little bit of that. The M Files is a great place to find portraits and newspaper clippings, but also so much more. As the clippings from the Memphis Information File are digitized, they will be added to The M Files, but so will the smaller manuscript collections and most of the items used to create the topical digital displays in the Memphis Room.
